posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 120 T206 in Low/Mid-Grade - HOF'ers and Tougher Backs **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale. These are all low to mid-grade cards, ranging from very poor/filler to VG+, as the scans will show.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer. 

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing SOLD cards from list for easier viewing):

Brashear (Polar Bear) - $28
Congalton (Polar Bear) - $28
I. Hoffman (Polar Bear) - $40

Murray (Polar Bear) - $45
Rhoades - $65
Schirm (card on left) - $28
Seymour (batting – Sovereign 150) - $80

I’ll take Foley White.
